ModMetaData.name: Ecosystem Overhaul
ModMetaData.author: Coercion (Textures) | KapTaiN_KaVerN (Code)
ModMetaData.description: The purpose of this mod is to add a significant amount of new animals, plants and factions to the game, increase fauna and flora biome diversity and drastically change biome climate and weather to account for things like humidity.\nVersion 1.0 will focus on the Tropical Rainforest biome.
